TEXT.TITLE: SAYAD TO BE BRAZIL'S AMBASSADOR AT EC
TEXT.BODY: Joao Sayad, who resigned yesterday from his post as Planning Minister, accepted President Jose Sarney's invitation to fill the vacant post as Brazil's ambassador at the European Community (EC), a Presidential spokesman said. The spokesman said Sayad refused Sarney's request to remain as Planning Minister for another 30 days. Reuter
